intro.description: This tutorial describes how to install a new data project. In Bioclipse there is some premade projects with data that can be used e.g. when starting to know a new feature. One of them is called "DrugBank" and it will be used as an example in this tutorial.

item.title: Step 1: Download a data project
item.description: Choose Install > Data.... This opens a dialog that looks like, and work as, the dialog used when installing new features. Select "DrugBank feature" by clicking in the check-box in front of it and then click on finish.

item.title: Step 2: Install the data set
item.description:
After downloading the DrugBank data project you need to install it as well. To do this choose File > New... > Data, select New Drugbank Data Project and click on next.
On the next page you may give the project a new name, e.g. "Drugbank". Name it and click once more one next.
On the last page make sure that only the items you want is selected. In this case that only "DrugBank" is selected and click finish.
